pages.text: Crafted from $(l:decoration/mud_blocks)wet mud blocks$(), these bricks will also slow anyone walking upon them when placed in the world. $(info) All dry variants listed here are available through the stonecutter.

pages.title: Drying Into Blocks
pages.text: In addition to a regular furnace, wet mud bricks can be cooked at a much faster rate in a Kiln. Once dried, they can be used to craft stairs and other variants found in this entry.

pages.title: Drying Into Blocks
pages.text: Once dried, they can be used to craft stairs and other variants found in this entry.

pages.title: Alternate Brick Recipe
pages.text: In addition to forming when wet and cooking, you can also combined $(l:decorations/mud_blocks)dried mud blocks$() directly into bricks.
